author: sussman
msg: libsvn_auth, TNG -- issue #724.  Part 1 of the redesign plan.
* libsvn_auth/auth.c (svn_auth_save_credentials): try to save in the
provider that produced the creds, the resort to looping over all
stop taking a wc_dir arg, and remove the save function.  it's okay
to not be able to save.

author: sussman
msg: Add a quiet-mode (-q) switch to our python test framework.
Sometimes I just want to run ./basic_tests.py and NOT see every single
subcommand, it's overwhelming.  I miss the good old days of one line
per test, either PASS or FAIL.  If a test fails, then I'll run it
individually with all the screen spam.  :-)
(run_tests): have new '-q' switch activate the variable.

author: rooneg
msg: move the log message callback/baton pairs into the client context.
declaration, and add a svn_client_get_commit_log_t member and a log message
svn_client_copy, svn_client_move): remove log_msg_func and log_msg_baton
arguments, update documentation to indicate that the ones in ctx will be
(svn_client_mkdir): remove log_msg_func/log_msg_baton arguments, use the ones
(svn_cl__commit): make a new log message baton, since we have better info
about what path the client will have write access to in this function.
(svn_cl__copy): update call to svn_client_copy.  remove creation of log
(svn_cl__delete): update call to svn_client_delete.  remove creation of log
(svn_cl__import): update call to svn_client_import.  remove creation of log
(svn_cl__mkdir): update call to svn_client_mkdir.  remove creation of log
(svn_cl__move): update call to svn_client_move.  remove creation of log
